title: Research
text:
Published


Syk, Edvin. 2022. “Development of Job Quality in Sweden 1968–2010.” Research in Social Stratification and Mobility 82 (December): 100745. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rssm.2022.100745.


Westerman, Johan, and Edvin Syk. 2023. “Skills and Structural Change.” In A Research Agenda for Skills and Inequality, edited by Michael Tåhlin, 51–63. Edward Elgar Publishing.

title: About
text:
I’m a PhD-candidate in Sociology at SOFI at Stockholm University. My research interest is generally labor market focused, with an emphasis on job quality and working conditions. In my thesis I have thus far focused on the development of job quality in Sweden over the last six decades. Both in terms of the general development for men and women over time and the changes for individuals over the career (forthcoming).
Also interested in quantitative methods including bayesian statistics, as well as stratification and inequality.
